column1: NGR is that given in the School records, but this looks to be 100 yards too far north. The school house (1913 to 1916) may be in a different location on the records it is shown as being 100 yards further from the church than the school, which may be correct or just a different estimate
There are 3 duplicate readings for the overlapping period of Raven House with the School, i.e 132 monthly readings, and randomly spread; probaby not suspicious
